Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Bat-el is just four years old and she was a victim of one of Saddam Hussein's earlier Scud missiles attacks on the central area of Israel, For several days her life hung in the balance after surgeons removed shards of shattered glass from her brain.
